title: October 29, 2019: 0x (ZRX): Down 2.66%
text:
0x: What’s the Latest Regarding its Price?

At the time of this writing, 0x has a price of $0.2854 USD, which puts it down by approximately 2.66% from yesterday. Yesterday’s down day is a reversal of the day before it; in terms of trend, though, note that the current price is now 3.36% below its 20 day moving average, and is currently in a down trend over the past 14 days. 0x’s expected trading range — as forecasted by the Bollinger bands indicator, which determines a range based on momentum and volatility over the past two weeks — is between $0.270879 and $0.319791. As we are closer to the bottom of that range, rangebound traders may wish to consider exploring buying opportunities.

Trade 0x (ZRX) and over 500 other cryptos across ten different exchanges — all from one app. Try Quadency.

As for 0x’s market cap, it is currently at about $173M US dollars.

Update on Transactions and Holders

Over the past 24 hours, 1,226 transfers have been added to the blockchain recording transactions amongst holders of 0x. As for the number of holders, yesterday saw the number of wallets holding 0x rise by 0. Our engagement rank, which combines weekly percentage growth in number of holders and number of transfers, has 0x ranked 9 out of the 32 Ethereum tokens we’re tracking.

Observing 0x’s Richest Wallets

The top 1,000 0x wallets hold over 89.3% of the token’s total money supply. If we focus on exchanges, which may be an correlated with liquidity and greater confidence in the currency, the exchange wallets that are in the top 1,000 wallets own 4.83% of the currency’s total money supply. In terms of growth rates, the share of total supply of the richest 1,000 wallets has grown by -0.13% over the past week. For the exchange wallets within the richest 1,000 wallets, their share has grown by -0.18%. The underlying smart contract itself for 0x owns 0.01% of the total money supply; over the past week, this amount has not changed.

Technical Development Status

0x has been active recently on its GitHub repos, with its most recent code updates occurring today, October 29, 2019. Growth rates for open issues — a “”to-do list”” of sorts and watchers (“”subscribers”” following a code repository) for 0x are growing by 0.5 and 1.5, respectively, over the past 30 days.

What’s Going on Social Media?

Social media growth, in terms of Reddit subscribers, came in at up 5 over the past day for 0x. If you are interested in following 0x on social media, Twitter, where it has 151,337 following it, may be a good place to start. Here is the Twitter page for 0x.

Where to Buy

You can trade 0x, listed under the symbol ZRX, through the following exchanges: Gate, Yobit, Binance, DDEX, Ethfinex.

Article by SixJupiter
